# commit()

**Instance Method**

Applies any pending additions to and removals from the residency set.

## Declaration

```swift
func commit()
```

## Discussion

Call the method when have no other changes to stage, such as with [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLResidencySet/addAllocation(_:)], [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLResidencySet/removeAllocation(_:)], and their sibling methods.
title: commit()
